text: Nikita Madjaroglou was a male German international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1931 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's singles and two years later he won another bronze in the mixed doubles with Annemarie Schulz at the 1933 World Table Tennis Championships. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:German male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Nikita Madjaroglou
